title: Delicate Diamond Kangan Set - Sparkling Elegance
materials: Round Brilliant Cut Diamonds. Each diamond is meticulously selected for its clarity (VS1-VS2) and color (G-H). Features our signature Hyderabadi polish for a lasting luster.
features: These sleek kangans feature a minimalist yet elegant design. The gold is formed into delicate segments, each accented with a sparkling diamond flower motif in a bezel setting. The design merges traditional bangle form with contemporary diamond styling. The slim profile makes them perfect for stacking or wearing alone.
occasions: or as a thoughtful gift. These bangles also complement traditional South Indian attire for festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranthi.
description: These diamond kangans represent a harmonious blend of modern design and traditional sensibilities. The delicate diamond detailing adds a touch of luxury without compromising on comfort. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting brilliance, making this a timeless investment.
